mapper.select: SELECT A.PRJT_CD prjtCd, A.PRJT_NM prjtNm, A.TR_ACCT_CD trAcctCd, A.TR_ACCT_NM trAcctNm, A.CSTMR_NM cstmrNm, A.CHGR_NM chgrNm, A.HP_NO hpNo, A.CHGR_HP_NO chgrHpNo, A.CNTRCT_SECT_CD cntrctSectCd, A.CNTRCT_SECT_CD_NM cntrctSectCdNm, A.PRSN_NO prsnNo, A.PRSN_NM prsnNm, A.DSTRBT_SECT_CD dstrbtSectCd, A.DSTRBT_SECT_CD_NM dstrbtSectCdNm, DATE_FORMAT(A.WORK_START_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') workStartDt, DATE_FORMAT(A.WORK_END_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') workEndDt, A.PRSN_MM prsnMm, A.ORDR_UNIT_CST_AMT ordrUnitCstAmt, CONCAT(A.JUMIN_NO1, '-', A.JUMIN_NO2) juminNo, A.LAW_BIZ_NM lawBizNm, B.CNTRCT_CD cntrctCd, B.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD cntrctStatusCd, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '017' AND DTL_CD = B.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD) cntrctStatusCdNm, B.MEMO_DESC memoDesc FROM ( SELECT T1.PRJT_CD, T1.PRJT_NM, T1.TR_ACCT_CD, (SELECT TR_ACCT_NM FROM T_PMS001 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD) TR_ACCT_NM, T1.CSTMR_NM, (SELECT CHGR_NM FROM T_PMS002 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD AND CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO) CHGR_NM, (SELECT HP_NO FROM T_PMS002 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD AND CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO) CHGR_HP_NO, T3.HP_NO, T3.CNTRCT_SECT_CD, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '004' AND DTL_CD = T3.CNTRCT_SECT_CD) CNTRCT_SECT_CD_NM, T3.PRSN_NO, T3.PRSN_NM, T2.DSTRBT_SECT_CD, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '011' AND DTL_CD = T2.DSTRBT_SECT_CD) DSTRBT_SECT_CD_NM, T2.WORK_START_DT, T2.WORK_END_DT, T2.PRSN_MM, T2.ORDR_UNIT_CST_AMT, T3.JUMIN_NO1, T3.JUMIN_NO2, T3.LAW_BIZ_NM FROM T_PMS006 T1 INNER JOIN T_PMS007 T2 INNER JOIN T_PMS003 T3 ON T1.PRJT_CD=T2.PRJT_CD AND T2.PRSN_NO=T3.PRSN_NO WHERE T1.PRJT_CD=#{prjtCd} AND T2.DSTRBT_SEQ_NO=#{dstrbtSeqNo} ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PMS011 B ON (A.PRJT_CD=B.PRJT_CD AND A.PRSN_NO=B.PRSN_NO)

SELECT CONCAT('C', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), 'O', LPAD(CAST(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(CNTRCT_CD, 7, 3))+1, 1) AS CHAR), 3, '0')) maxCntrctCd FROM T_PMS011 WHERE SUBSTR(CNTRCT_CD, 2, 4) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PMS011 ( CNTRCT_CD, CNTRCT_STATUS_CD, MEMO_DESC, PRJT_CD, PRSN_NO, RGT_TM, RGTR_ID, UPT_TM, UPTR_ID ) VALUES ( #{cntrctCd}, #{cntrctStatusCd}, #{memoDesc0}, #{prjtCd}, #{prsnNo}, NOW(), #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{uptrId} )

INSERT INTO T_PMS012 ( CNTRCT_CD, HST_SEQ_NO, CNTRCT_STATUS_CD, MEMO_DESC, PRJT_CD, PRSN_NO, RGT_TM, RGTR_ID ) VALUES ( #{cntrctCd}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(HST_SEQ_NO), 0)+1 FROM T_PMS012 ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE CNTRCT_CD=#{cntrctCd}), #{cntrctStatusCd}, #{memoDesc0}, #{prjtCd}, #{prsnNo}, NOW(), #{rgtrId} )

INSERT INTO T_PMS013 ( CNTRCT_CD, DPST_SEQ_NO, DPST_DT, DPST_CD, RMLRK_DESC, SUPPLY_AMT, TAX_AMT, MEMO_DESC, DPST_YN, RGT_TM, RGTR_ID, UPT_TM, UPTR_ID ) VALUES ( #{cntrctCd}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(DPST_SEQ_NO), 0)+1 FROM T_PMS013 ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE CNTRCT_CD=#{cntrctCd}), #{dpstDt}, #{dpstCd}, #{rmlrkDesc}, #{supplyAmt}, #{taxAmt}, #{memoDesc}, 'N', NOW(), #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{uptrId} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_PMS013 WHERE CNTRCT_CD = #{cntrctCd} AND DPST_YN = 'N'
